title: Fix this game.
body:
Ok I just need to bring to your attention a few things. 

First of all I'd like you guys to maybe fix up Shen's dash. So his passive, Ki Barrier, gives a shield on SPELL CAST. I love to play Shen on my other account and I've noticed that he never gets his shield until the end of his dash. Now it say on spell cast so I thought that its just a little tweak that might help him a little in ganks.

Second, I think changing Rengar's Q back to its original state was a HUGE mistake. Now he's just supplying too much damage. I mean come on Riot, a insta crit with his R, and a double Q? Too much. If you're running exhaust you'd have to be a god to pop it on him before he jumps you.

Third, I understand that you're giving Illaoi a cool skin and showing her some love because it SEEMS like she's been left in the dust. Illaoi is just way too powerful. Let's take a look here at Illaoi.

1. You can't beat her early. You cant win level one, two, or three.

2. You basically can't fight her, and she just shoves wave into turret. Ok cool, I can CS under tower well. Sike, she's going to Q and throw her tentacle skill shot out of turret range and continue to damage you. 

3. Your jungler comes to gank you. Let's assume you're playing someone like Camile or Darius. You've CC'd her and are attempting to kill her. Hey, let me just grab your soul and R. I've just now taken half of your and your junglers health with a empowered auto on a 4 second cool down.

5. 7 MAN ULT, KILLS TWO FOR PRICE OF ONE.

replies.body: "I AM ONE PERSON WITH STRONG OPINIONS REEEEEE"
